patthana16.29:1.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ hetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke aṭṭha …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.29:2.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ nahetuṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
